title: Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man Illaoi
body: My idea for the best Illaoi that ever was or will be. All of her tentacles will obviously be flailing tube men. She could be dressed like a used car sales man. You know, white short sleeve button up, tie, khakis etc. 10/10 would main Illaoi just for this skin tbh.

replies.body:
Top lane will be loads of fun then

https://img.ifcdn.com/images/10149b4f2ce7a49f0bb43626591c9c558a870ba3960a5d3259a134404ecc8f4b_1.gif

"as a kid" - Scared now and im 17.
17? ah, the age where you think you're not a kid anymore. :3
My dad called me a man when I was 12, idk what u r talking about
I think you mean 18+...  C h i l d r e n  l i v e  o n.
When working on Void Illaoi we often talked about this exact same concept xD If only we could record some extra lines for it....

Using Q: "Drive away!"
Using W: "You cannot hide from my god... you cannot hide from my briefcase!"
Using E:  "They say salesmen are bloodsuckers. I only take souls." "I'm collecting intrest." "Take this sale or I'll take your soul!"
Using R: "SALE!"
AAing: "I'll give you ten percent off... your skull!"
whenever she uses her W it makes a cha'ching sound, and she shouts sales! instead of move.

CORPORATE , SALESWOMAN/PERSON ILLAOI, OR MARKETING ILLAOI.

Please, please pass this along if you can to the right peoples. She needs another skin, and this is a truly great idea.
I think we can safely say it'd be hilarious. Please propose the idea again!
Up voted cuz I love this idea
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nBjyOOFaEmA/maxresdefault.jpg
I was watching this episode last night!

It was when i saw Family Guy 'blue harvest' that i really snapped, lol.
{{champion:420}} "Keep in motion...with this lovely Hextech powered automobile! You get 20% off for every time this briefcase hits your face!"
Somebody call Riot immediately. This needs to happen.
Used care salesman illaoi and tahm kench
Only if used care salesman Tahm is voiced by Danny Devito
yessss
Im conflicted... I hate facing Illinois, with a passion, but the skin idea would be hilarious
That is state-ist.
I hate Illinois and I live here  =P
*triggered*
And her idol is a briefcase, in which she hits you with it. Would be SUPER hilarious XD
Happy Tree Friends skins for the Yordles

I was talking to my brother last week about having an Illaoi skin with this.

Car salesman idea wouldn't work very well. we were thinking Dunkmaster skin line. her Idol is laready round. put her in a jersey, turn the idol into a ball, and make her tentacles into tube men. it'll sell like crazy.

I feel like a car salesman skin line would be kind of cool.  This could totally be one of them.
Sivir has one of those cardboard signs and says "better deals!" when she uses Q.
Would work with primetime draven. Forecast janna.  Anchorman Nautilous.
Used Car's salesman Illoi.

I said they should do this literally right after her release.

"My dad..."

dad...{{champion:420}}

This would go well with sign flipper jax.
To keep with the skin lines why don't you do shoutcaster illaoi. Would be a 4th wall breaker, with her yelling when she gets a double kill and such. Kind of like the sportscaster skins but more meta.
Still waiting on Scuttle Gromp skin for Tahm Kench
WWIAFTM ILLAOI
"Car sales Illaoi"
I would buy this.
But, Car Saleswoman Illoai would be better, and could still use inflatable arm men for her tentacles XD
Make the inflatables more pool-based, and you have a Pool Party Illaoi.
Or how about corporate illoai? A continuation of the corporate skin line.
This idea has been floating around for months now but it really does need to happen, I saw a sketch for it once
Let's Get Wacky!
